original_text: The cities in the south of Judah will keep their gates shut. Nobody will go in or out of the cities. Enemies will take the people of Judah away as prisoners. They will take them all into exile. The cities in the south of Judah will keep their gates shut.
korean_text: 네겝의 성읍들이 봉쇄되어 열 자가 없고 유다가 다 잡혀가되 온전히 잡혀가도다

sentences.original_text: The cities in the south of Judah

sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 성문을 닫은 채로 유지할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Nobody will go in or out
Enemies will take the people of Judah
They will take them all into exile
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 모두 포로로 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: The cities in the south of Judah

sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 성문을 닫은 채로 유지할 것이다
